SELECT b.id AS beneficiaryId, b.name, b.phone, b.gender, b.birthdate, b.address, b.last_counsel_date AS lastCounselDate, CASE WHEN b.status = 1 THEN '서비스 중' ELSE '서비스 해지' END AS status,
/* 카테고리 플래그 계산 */ CASE WHEN b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isChurnRisk,
CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasComplaint,
CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasTermination,
CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90 ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isCareLevelExpiring,
/* 계약만료임박: beneficiary_history의 terminate_date 기준 30일 이내 */ CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isContractExpiring,
CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 2 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasRentalCounsel
FROM beneficiary b WHERE b.status = 1
AND (b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND (b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) )
AND ( (b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90 )
/* 계약만료임박: beneficiary_history의 terminate_date 기준 30일 이내 */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 )
AND ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 2 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) )
ORDER BY b.name ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM beneficiary b WHERE b.status = 1
AND (b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND (b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY))
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY))
AND ( (b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)) )
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90)
/* 계약만료임박: beneficiary_history의 terminate_date 기준 30일 이내 */ AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30)
AND ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30) )
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 2 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY))

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM beneficiary b WHERE b.status = 1 AND (b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30)) AS churnRiskCount,
(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ch.beneficiary_id) FROM counsel_history ch INNER JOIN beneficiary b ON ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND b.status = 1 WHERE ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) AS complaintCount,
(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ch.beneficiary_id) FROM counsel_history ch INNER JOIN beneficiary b ON ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND b.status = 1 WHERE ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)) AS terminationCount,
(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bcl.beneficiary_id) FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl INNER JOIN beneficiary b ON bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND b.status = 1 WHERE bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90) AS careLevelExpiringCount,
/* 계약만료임박: beneficiary_history의 terminate_date 기준 30일 이내 */ (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bh.beneficiary_id) FROM beneficiary_history bh INNER JOIN beneficiary b ON bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND b.status = 1 WHERE bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30) AS contractExpiringCount,
(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ch.beneficiary_id) FROM counsel_history ch INNER JOIN beneficiary b ON ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND b.status = 1 WHERE ch.counsel_category_id = 2 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) AS rentalCounselCount

SELECT b.id AS beneficiaryId, b.name, b.last_counsel_date AS lastCounselDate, DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) AS daysSinceLastCounsel, CASE WHEN b.last_counsel_date IS NULL OR DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.last_counsel_date) > 30 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isChurnRisk,
CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasComplaint,
CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasTermination,
(SELECT bh.terminate_date FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id ORDER BY bh.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS plannedTerminationDate,
(SELECT bcl.end_date FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id ORDER BY bcl.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS careLevelEndDate, (SELECT DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id ORDER BY bcl.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS daysUntilCareLevelExpiry, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_care_level bcl WHERE bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bcl.end_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bcl.end_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 90 ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isCareLevelExpiring,
/* 계약만료임박: beneficiary_history의 terminate_date 기준 */ (SELECT bh.terminate_date FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id ORDER BY bh.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS contractEndDate, (SELECT DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id ORDER BY bh.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS daysUntilContractExpiry, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM beneficiary_history bh WHERE bh.beneficiary_id = b.id AND bh.terminate_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(bh.terminate_date, NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isContractExpiring,
CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM counsel_history ch WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = b.id AND ch.counsel_category_id = 2 AND ch.consult_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasRentalCounsel,
(SELECT cw.employee_id FROM matching m INNER JOIN care_worker cw ON m.care_worker_id = cw.id WHERE m.beneficiary_id = b.id AND m.status = 'Y' ORDER BY m.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS careWorkerId, (SELECT e.name FROM matching m INNER JOIN care_worker cw ON m.care_worker_id = cw.id INNER JOIN employee e ON cw.employee_id = e.id WHERE m.beneficiary_id = b.id AND m.status = 'Y' ORDER BY m.id DESC LIMIT 1) AS careWorkerName
FROM beneficiary b WHERE b.id = #{beneficiaryId}

SELECT ch.id AS counselId, ch.consult_date AS consultDate, ch.summary, ch.detail, ch.follow_up AS followUp, ch.follow_up_necessary AS followUpNecessary, e.name AS counselorName, mcc.name AS categoryName FROM counsel_history ch LEFT JOIN employee e ON ch.counselor_id = e.id LEFT JOIN m_counsel_category mcc ON ch.counsel_category_id = mcc.id WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND ch.counsel_category_id = 4 ORDER BY ch.consult_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ch.id AS counselId, ch.consult_date AS consultDate, ch.summary, ch.detail, ch.follow_up AS followUp, ch.follow_up_necessary AS followUpNecessary, e.name AS counselorName, mcc.name AS categoryName FROM counsel_history ch LEFT JOIN employee e ON ch.counselor_id = e.id LEFT JOIN m_counsel_category mcc ON ch.counsel_category_id = mcc.id WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND ch.counsel_category_id = 5 ORDER BY ch.consult_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ch.id AS counselId, ch.consult_date AS consultDate, ch.summary, ch.detail, ch.follow_up AS followUp, ch.follow_up_necessary AS followUpNecessary, e.name AS counselorName, mcc.name AS categoryName FROM counsel_history ch LEFT JOIN employee e ON ch.counselor_id = e.id LEFT JOIN m_counsel_category mcc ON ch.counsel_category_id = mcc.id WHERE ch.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND ch.counsel_category_id = 2 ORDER BY ch.consult_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT cw.employee_id FROM matching m INNER JOIN care_worker cw ON m.care_worker_id = cw.id WHERE m.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND m.status = 'Y' ORDER BY m.id DESC LIMIT 1
